culprit.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the person who is guilty of a crime or doing something wrong
culprit.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Police finally managed to catch the culprit.
culprit.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the reason for a particular problem or difficulty
